titles.title: StoneShield, Breathable, Anti-Algae
titles.title2: Multi-surface stain and sealer for concrete, pavers, and masonry.

product_overview: Multi-surface stain and sealer for concrete, pavers, and masonry.
short_description: Protects, colors, and waterproofs your surfaces.
positioning: StoneShield offers breathable protection and colour enhancement for concrete, pavers, and masonry.

features_benefits.benefit: Allows moisture to escape without blistering or peeling
Prevents algae and moss growth on masonry surfaces
Resists UV degradation for long-lasting colour and durability
Enhances surface colour while adding a protective seal
Compatible with concrete, pavers, and brick

recommended_use.intro: Designed for exterior and interior masonry, pavers, and concrete protection.

application_system.label: Surface Prep
application_system.purpose: Remove loose paint, dirt, and dust. Ensure clean, dry surface.

application_system.label: First Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply evenly with roller or squeegee.

application_system.label: Second Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply after 8 hrs for durable protection.

surface_preparation: Remove all loose paint, algae, and dust
Ensure surface is smooth and dry
Clean with water; let dry fully before sealing
application: Apply evenly using roller or squeegee
Work in thin coats to avoid pooling

limitations.Not Recommended For: Polished stone or glossy non-porous surfaces

storage_safety: Store sealed in cool, shaded conditions
Do not expose to direct sunlight

safety_first_aid.General: Work in ventilated area; wear gloves
safety_first_aid.Skin Contact: Wash thoroughly with soap and water
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Avoid inhaling vapours; wear mask if enclosed

environmental_commitment: Water-based, low-VOC formula that provides long-term protection while preserving breathability of masonry surfaces.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply with roller or squeegee. Fill cracks before coating.
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Remove loose paint and clean surfaces before application
